attributes.action: Children who travel to school on a bus should be able to travel free.
attributes.additional_details: Children could order a bus pass with their secondary school name on it to show that they are on their way to school.
attributes.background: Children who are either in a secondary or primary school that travel to school on the bus should be able to travel free of charge (not paying).

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617780
